params.index: index of the first request ID
params.maxRequestIds: maximum number of request IDs to return

params.asset: address of the asset to burn

params.requestId: request ID of the withdrawal to process

COLLATERAL().notice: Get an address of the collateral.

USDE().notice: Get an address of the USDe contract.

approveUSDeMinter().notice: Approve the USDe to a minter (if a new minter appears).

requestIds(uint256,uint256).notice: Get a list of unprocessed request IDs.

requestIdsLength().notice: Get the number of unprocessed request IDs.

triggerBurn(address).notice: Trigger a burn of any asset lying on this contract except sUSDe and USDe (after USDe redemption).

triggerClaim(address).notice: Trigger a claim of USDe (if `cooldownDuration` didn't equal zero while triggering withdrawal).

triggerInstantClaim().notice: Trigger an instant claim of USDe (if `cooldownDuration` equals zero).

triggerWithdrawal().notice: Trigger a withdrawal of USDe from the collateral's underlying asset.
